nodes.text: The Baskron Pirate group were pirates who controlled their own territory. In 3 ABY, the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry held a meeting between its top staff and bridge crews regarding a hypermatter leak from their CR90 corvette the Thunderstrike. In the meeting, two crew members from the Braha'tok-class gunship Apailana's Promise, the Thunderstrike's escort, proposed travelling to the Baskron Pirate territory and making a deal for materials to repair the corvette. The Sixty-First ultimately raided an Imperial heavy freighter instead.
The Baskron Pirate group was mentioned in the 2015 canon novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
